live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
28694.summary: Some customers in the Lakewood area of Spruce Grove are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
28694.title: Nov 8 – Spruce Grove (Lakewood) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
